analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/43/0x99c580d299c9d565c57f147cab346601160d0b60.sol:
	Contract BitcoinMeesterCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x99c580d299c9d565c57f147cab346601160d0b60.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x99c580d299c9d565c57f147cab346601160d0b60.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
